Thabat

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم الحمد لله الذي شرف العلما ببقا السند وعلو الاستاذ ... :Incipit
Written in one column, 25 lines per page, in black ink.

Ownership statement by Muḥammad ibn al-Sayyid ʻAbd Allāh ibn al-Sayyid ʻUmar Abū Aḥmad (?) ... al-Ḥanafī al-Rashīdī (?) al-Khalwatī, in which he says he got the ms from al-Shaykh Aḥmad al-T.būkī (?) on 8 Ṣafar 1278 AH [August 15, 1861 AD].
MS Arab 308. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
